name: TV Series NLP Analyzer
description: An NLP system that scrapes and analyzes over 10,000+ character dialogues using Scrapy and Spacy, with an interactive Gradio web UI featuring a character chatbot trained with Llama 3.1.

name: Chest Cancer Classification
description: An end-to-end deep learning solution using EfficientNet-B3 for automated chest cancer classification from CT scans, achieving 85% accuracy with a modern MLOps pipeline.
